title-group.article-title: A 1982 Survey of Corporate Leasing Analysis

abstract.p: This paper provides the results of a survey, conducted in 1982, of corporate leasing analysis. The survey was mailed to the first 195 of the Fortune 500 firms. The findings permit an update of an earlier survey by Anderson and Martin.
